alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Eastern Teton; Southern Rocky Mountain Front (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 6:49PM MST until March 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and snow. Ice accumulation of a light glaze. Snow accumulations up to one inch. * WHERE...Lewis and Clark and Teton Counties, including the Southern Rocky Mountain Front. This does not include the Lincoln and Helena areas. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Dense freezing fog will reduce visibility to one-quarter mile at times tonight and add an additional light glaze of ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark; Eastern Teton; Southern Rocky Mountain Front
